mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM DTN_QAINFO A JOIN DTN_FILE_DETAIL B ON A.ATCH_FILE_ID = B.ATCH_FILE_ID AND A.QA_ID = #{qaId}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM DTN_QAINFO qa LEFT JOIN STN_GOODS g ON g.GOODS_ID = qa.GOODS_ID LEFT JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG pcm ON pcm.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID AND pcm.USE_AT = 'Y' LEFT JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = pcm.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT='Y' LEFT JOIN DTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE cd ON cd.CODE = qa.QESTN_TY_CODE AND cd.CODE_ID IN ('CMS018','CMS019')

SELECT QA_ID ,SITE_ID ,GOODS_ID ,(SELECT GOODS_NM FROM STN_GOODS WHERE GOODS_ID = qa.GOODS_ID) AS GOODS_NM ,ATCH_FILE_ID ,QESTN_SJ ,QESTN_CN ,WRITNG_DE ,WRTER_ID ,WRTER_NM ,EMAIL_ADRES ,WRTER_TELNO ,WRITNG_PASSWORD ,ANSWER_CN ,ANSWER_DE ,ANSWER_ID ,ANSWER_NM ,QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE ,QA_SE_CODE ,QESTN_TY_CODE ,SECRET_AT ,FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,FRST_REGISTER_ID ,LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID ,USE_AT FROM DTN_QAINFO qa WHERE QA_ID = #{qaId}

SELECT A.* FROM DTN_QAINFO A JOIN STN_ORDER B ON A.GOODS_ID = B.GOODS_ID JOIN STN_ORDER_DLVY C ON B.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.QA_SE_CODE = #{qaSeCode} AND C.ORDER_DLVY_NO = #{searchOrderDlvyNo} ORDER BY A.QA_ID DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM DTN_QAINFO WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId} AND USE_AT = 'Y' AND FRST_REGISTER_ID = #{frstRegisterId} ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 1
